name: Buck Off!
description:
Computers, Ghosts... and Shotguns?

You're enjoying the afterlife when one day you get sucked into a computer! The other ghosts appear to have noticed and want in. Luckily there is a shotgun nearby...

Use the mouse to shoot the shotgun and destroy the ghosts Kill as many as you can!

Looking at ghosts will stun them

*All assets are original and made in 72 hours for Minijam#117 Ghosts! With the limitation of "Shotgun as a mechanic"
